entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Grand Rapids

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 09 January 2023
